alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Lonoke; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lonoke, southeastern Faulkner and northeastern Pulaski Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Olmstead, or 10 miles northwest of Little Rock AFB, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Little Rock... Conway... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Cabot... Little Rock AFB... Vilonia... Mayflower... Austin in Lonoke County... Gibson... Gravel Ridge... Sylvan Hills... Olmstead... South Bend... Marche... Hamlet... Saltillo... Macon... Otto... Cato... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
